version_description: • Sorry, BMW. We really love you! Some users experienced difficulties using our new BMW feature. This update fixes these problems. From now on all users can connect their iPhone and BMW ConnectedDrive to access rental agreements using the iDrive controlle

• Sorry, BMW. We really love you! Some users experienced difficulties using our new BMW feature. This update fixes these problems. From now on all users can connect their iPhone and BMW ConnectedDrive to access rental agreements using the iDrive controlle

• Sixt Fastlane: Rent, unlock and lock your rental car quick, hassle-free and stationless with the Sixt app. The first participating station is Zurich Airport. For more information, please visit sixt-fastlane.com
• Choice Upgrade at Vehicle Selection:

• February 29th: If you consider to rent one of our great rental cars on February 29th, you should also consider to update to the latest version. Otherwise you might not find this day. :)

• We made some improvements for Sixt Fastlane. Sign up for free and open your car keyless at Zurich Airport. For more information visit sixt-fastlane.com or contact fastlane-ch@sixt.com

• We simplified the handling of your different profiles and rates
• Many improvements in the background

• Forgot your pin? Now you can change it easily in the app

Fastlane Updates:

Bugfixes
Bugfixes

• You can now contact our awesome Facebook team via Messenger directly in the app. Come on, they are waiting for you!

As fictional heroes roam the movie screen, our superheroes work to improve your car rental experience everyday.

Whoomp, there it is!
We are very proud to present the new Sixt Rent a Car App! This is an update that’s so big, so good and so new that you should let it cool off first. Just kidding, go ahead and take advantage of our improved features and design! Her

Whoomp, there it is!
We are very proud to present the new Sixt Rent a Car App! This is an update that’s so big, so good and so new that you should let it cool off first. Just kidding, go ahead and take advantage of our improved features and design! Her

We are listening to your feedback! We are bringing back two of the most loved features:
- Bonus Programs
- Vehicle choice at selected locations

Please share your feedback with us further on!

Thanks for all your feedback this year.
We have further improved the app in this version, so that you can rent your car (or truck) even smoother.

Happy holidays & please continue sharing your Feedback with us!

Thanks for all your feedback this year.
We have further improved the app in this version, so that you can rent your car (or truck) even smoother.

Happy holidays & please continue sharing your Feedback with us!

Happy Holidays!
We do not have any chocolate to give, but instead a lot of premium cars and more improvements in your Sixt app:

- add a flight number to your reservation, so that your car is still waiting for you if your flight is delayed
- a

Your Sixt App Team

RENT? SHARE? RIDE? APP!

RENT: DIGITAL CAR RENTAL
Skip the counter! Open your car directly with our App and enjoy the ride.

SHARE: CARSHARING WITH NO LIMITS
No limits for cars, duration and drop-off points - also at any SIXT station.

You spoke, we listened! For SIXT share you can now filter for your favorite manufacturer, transmission type, fuel level and more to find your ideal car, including our new BMW and MINI models.

Our app also got smarter and now remembers your last use

You spoke, we listened! For SIXT share you can now filter for your favorite manufacturer, transmission type, fuel level and more to find your ideal car, including our new BMW and MINI models.

Our app also got smarter and now remembers your last use

• SIXT share now offers the possibility to select a protection option for your trip to reduce your excess.
• If you book a taxi with SIXT ride and it does not have a fixed price, we now show you the calculated price ran
